2023 Sauvignon Blanc – Napa Valley, CA

$32.00

It’s bright and refreshing, with aromas of citrus, green apple, and hints of tropical fruit. The palate showcases zesty lemon, grapefruit, and a touch of herbal notes, finishing with crisp acidity and a clean, vibrant finish.

SKU: 12 Category: Uncategorized

    Bottle Specs

    Weight 3.5 lbs
    Dimensions 5 × 5 × 15 in
    Bottle Size 750ml
    Alcohol Percentage 13%

    Terroir & Vintage

    Vintage 2023
    Varietals Sauvignon Blanc
    Region Napa Valley

    Aromas & Palate

    Aromas Jammy Black Raspberry, Cherry, Blackberry, Hints of Melted Chocolate, Anise
    Flavor Profile Boldness, Depth, Dark Fruits, Complex Nuances
